metadata.title: CVE-2019-7636 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) through 1.2.15 and 2.x through 2.0.9 has aheap-based buffer over-read in SDL_GetRGB in video/SDL_pixels.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7636` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsdl2-2.0-0 - 2.0.8+dfsg1-1ubuntu1.18.04.4
No subscription required

libsdl1.2debian - 1.2.15+dfsg2-0.1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsdl2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.8+dfsg1-1ubuntu1.18.04.4').
libsdl1.2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.15+dfsg2-0.1ubuntu0.1').
